pages.text:
Title: Effect of Selected Psychological Factors during the Postoperative Rehabilitation Process after Total Knee or Hip Replacement

Abstract: Purpose: The aim of this study was to evaluate the effect of psychological factors (rehabilitation motivation, social support and locus of control) on the postoperative outcomes pain and physical function after total knee or hip replacement.

Keywords: Surgery, Psychology, Physical therapy, Psychotherapist, Medicine, Physical medicine and rehabilitation
